description:
Season: 19
Original Air Date: 2/14/2006

Nick questions Dante about what is going on until Felicia begins to hyperventilate. Felicia talk about how she wants Nick and Bridget to raise Dominick and Nick would like to give Dominick the last name Forrester Marone. Meanwhile, Ridge surprises Brooke with candlelit room and romantic music for Valentine’s Day. Brooke is upset with Ridge’s gift of lingerie. Ridge wants Brooke to give him another chance. Taylor talks to Hector on the phone about how he wants her to be his Valentine and she is interrupted by Dante’s arrival at her door. Dante tells Taylor that he thinks he is Dominick’s father. Dante asks Taylor for help in finding out if he is Dominick’s father. Dante and Taylor confront Felicia about Dante possibly being the father of Dominick.
